error.bad_api: Unable to retrieve Location List from EPA - probably bad API Key

user.title: Set up EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
user.description: You need to sign up for an EPA Developer account as described in the readme and obtain an API Key.

location.title: Set up EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
location.description:
Latitude and longitude will be used to find the nearest EPA air quality monitoring station to obtain air quality data for your location.

The default values come from your homeassistant "Home" zone (See Settings/Areas & Zones/Zones).

error.bad_api: Unable to retrieve Location List from EPA - probably bad API Key

init.title: Configure EPA (Victoria) Air Monitoring
init.description: Change the API Key if required, latitude and longitude used to find the nearest weather station, or Site ID.
